MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the LL14 postcode areas of Wrexham and Ruthin, affecting a large number properties in the local area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.25am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 12.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.51am on 14th April 2021.
